resources.string:
Hello, my name is Pascal De Borger, and I am an System Administrator 
 with a large knowledge of Programming, like Java ! I have experience in Java Spring Application ans also Android Mobile App Development. I have knowlegde of Oracle Database and Oracle Middleware, like Weblogic Server. Nexus and Jenkins installation are not new to me. 

 Thank you so much for being here. It means the world of me !
